nodes.text: The planet Iridonia was liberated by the Galactic Republic in 3963 BBY during the Mandalorian Wars, freeing the planet from the control of the Mandalorian Neo-Crusaders The Republic Military counterattacked after the Mandalorian invasion with the support of Zabrak military units, driving the Mandalorians off-planet, but a Mandalorian presence remained in Iridonian society.
